mapper.select: SELECT tp.product_name,t.navigation_id,t.navigation_name,tnm.navigation_id, tnm.navigation_menu_id,tp.product_old_price,tpi.product_image_url, tpi.product_id FROM t_navigation t LEFT JOIN t_navigation_menu tnm ON t.navigation_id = tnm.navigation_id LEFT JOIN t_product tp ON tnm.navigation_menu_id = tp.navigation_menu_id left join t_product_image tpi on tp.product_id = tpi.product_id where tp.product_status = 1 and tpi.product_image_is_delete = 0;
